name: User Story

title: ''
labels: ''

---

### Story
**As a** [role]
**I need** [function]
**So that** [benefit]

### Assumptions and details
* [document what you know]

### A/C
**Given** [set of preconditions]
**When** [some action is taken]
**Then** [outcome is observed]
